com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v1
Class ID3v1Tag

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v1.ID3v1Tag

public class ID3v1Tag
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for reading and writing the ID3v1 and ID3v1.1 tags. This tag is 128 bytes long, and is found at the end of the .mp3 file as shown below. The format of the tag is very simple, and there are eight fixed length fields. All of the fields are ISO-8859-1 encoded strings with the exception of the genre and the track fields. The genre is a number which is an index into a predeined list of music genres, or categories if you like. For example, a genre value of 1 indicates that the song is "Classic Rock". Finally, the track is stored within the last byte of the comments field. When the track number is stored there, the tag is considered to be version ID3v1.1.

 
ID1v1 Tag Format
Field Size (in bytes)
Tag Id 3
Song Title30
Artist 30
Album 30
Year 4
Comments 30
Track 0
Genre 1


See Also:
ID3 tag version 2.3.0 standard, wikipedia history of ID3 tags
